SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, rule_list_id FROM elp_rule_list WHERE rule_list_id = :rule_list_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_SEARCH: SELECT RULE_LIST_ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION, to_Char(EFFECTIVE,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EFFECTIVE, to_Char(EXPIRATION,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EXPIRATION FROM ELP_RULE_LIST WHERE CODE LIKE :Code AND DESCRIPTION LIKE :Description
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_rule_list SET code = :code, description = :description, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE rule_list_id = :rule_list_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_rule_list ( code, description, effective, expiration, created_by, rule_list_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :rule_list_id )
